1. Can you explain the process you follow to ensure accurate financial records and reports are maintained?
2. How do you handle discrepancies or errors in financial data? Can you provide an example of a situation where you identified and resolved an accounting discrepancy?
3. How do you stay updated on changes in accounting regulations and standards? Can you provide an example of how you implemented these changes in your previous role?
4. Can you discuss your experience with financial analysis and reporting? How do you use financial data to make informed business decisions?
5. Describe a time when you had to work on a team to complete a complex financial project. What role did you play, and how did you contribute to the team's success?
